projects.title: Reality Labs
projects.description:
Award-winning internal hackathon project for Reality Labs at Meta.

projects.title: VR Neural Networks
projects.description: A visualization of neural networks in VR. Includes a neural network implementation in C# from scratch (yes, it's slow).

projects.title: Multi-modal Voice Assistant
projects.description: A voice assistant (think Siri) augmented with context selection through an AR interface.

projects.title: MADDPG Predator-Prey
projects.description: An implementation of the MADDPG algorithm with Unity ML-Agents.

projects.title: Chromatone
projects.description: A VR experience that allows interaction with individual instruments through modulation and particle visualizations.

projects.title: Mizuna
projects.description: Programmatic synchronization of graphs between IPython and Overleaf.

projects.title: BEU
projects.description: An exercise to implement fighting game mechanics in a side-scrolling beat 'em up domain.

projects.title: Messenger URL Extractor
projects.description: A quick Python script to extract all URLs from a Facebook Messenger chat conversation.

projects.title: Modular Tetris
projects.description: An exercise to implement Tetris with modular frame-timing mechanics.

projects.title: VR n-back Experiment
projects.description: A replication of the n-back task to test working memory in VR environments.

projects.title: VR Proprioception Experiment
projects.description: An experiment to investigate how challenging is it for VR users to grab objects outside of their field of view.

projects.title: Aurora
projects.description: My contributions to an open-sourced utility that unifies RGB devices across different brands for synchronized lighting.

projects.title: TIDALSign
projects.description: Learn American Sign Language through sensory gloves and haptic feedback.

projects.title: JS<sup>3</sup>Inth
projects.description: Sine wave synthesizer and modulator for FPGA boards.
